name: I AM PIKASO
description:
Hi there! I am Pikaso, heard of me ?
Obviously yes! Now since you know that i am such a great artist, do you have it in you to guess what i am drawing? Well to make things difficult, i will only draw a part of the drawing and if you can guess it then you will get a bigger reward ,but don’t worry, if you can't then you can always ask me to draw more and i will be happy to help.
Let’s see how many drawings of mine you can guess!
